abstract: Soccer Roundup; New York City FC defeat Chicago Fire, 4-3; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: New York City F.C. won on the road against the Chicago Fire, 4-3, on Sunday in a wild affair that opened the M.L.S. season for both teams.

headline.main: New York City F.C. Kicks Off With a Wild Win at Chicago
headline.print_headline: New York City F.C. Kicks Off With a Wild Win at Chicago

snippet: New York City F.C. won on the road against the Chicago Fire, 4-3, on Sunday in a wild affair that opened the M.L.S. season for both teams.
